summary: Armor from the final fight in the Movie Gladiator that Russell Crowe wore.
descriptionHtml:
Comes with 4k and 2k textures that are compressed. Made it with Molorus' [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25206/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D25206%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D801639&pUp=1]Maximus Meridius Savegame[/url].

Type help in console and then type exactly "Maximus d" it should bring up a list of four items or so, make sure you spawn the npc so you can just kill him and get the armor faster, I may just end up creating a follower to have it.

First male-only armor retexture, It is meant to look like the armor the Maximus wore when he fought the emperor in the Colosseum. It has some texture issues on the hood, If anyone wants to modify the armor to remove the hood and the pins, and add more geometry to the pauldrons, I would be happy to help in the texturing.[right][/right]
author: majormodder
